Text: Thank you for posting this - I love the central concept of this series, although the organizing presence may be a bit much.  Simple, moral metaphysics play out rather well in this context.
Ditko?!?! I'm all over this. Thanks.

You're most welcome, MonkeyMindUSB and FriendlySpidey.

Great comment Monkey. Might be the deepest comment in the last amount of words I've had on any of my ups. : )

Yeah, I was pretty surprised to see Ditko's involvement myself. Unfortunately, I think it's only one issue. Shooter made a lot of friends during his time at Valiant, more of whom show up in some of the other Defiant titles. I'm trying to put complete runs together for those books as well. If I ever get there I'll up them, too.
Many thanks. I own all of these, but they are in storage on other side of teh country. Cheers. :)
You're most welcome, Zero_Assassin. Always happy to bring back the long box memories.
